name: Aggressive Thundercloud, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Class Guide © 2014, Paizo Inc.
savingThrow: Reflex negates and Fort negates (see text)
text: This spell functions as aggressive thundercloud, except it deals 6d6 points of electricity damage to any creature it strikes. The first creature damaged by the cloud is also stunned for 1 round (Fort negates); this is a sonic effect.
savingThrow_zh: 反射，通过则无效和强韧，通过则无效（见后文）
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同雷云侵袭（Aggressive Thundercloud）一般，不过它的攻击会对生物造成6d6点闪电伤害。第一个受到雷云伤害的生物还会被震慑（stunned）1轮（强韧，通过则无效）；这是个音波效果。
